UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Peptides derived from HIV-1 Vif: a non-substrate based novel type of HIV-1 protease inhibitors.
Literature.Author: Friedler A, Blumenzweig I, Baraz L, Steinitz M, Kotler M, Gilon C

Sequence Information.Target Organism: HIV-1(40-50% PR activity=1µM),Rous sarcoma virus(70-80% PR activity=1µM)
